瓾字的基本解释

瓾
wā
“窐”的讹字。

瓾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［měng］
［《字彙》母耿切］
甑带。《淮南子·说山训》：“弊箄甑瓾在袇茵之上，雖貪者不搏。”高诱注：“瓾、甑帶；搏，取。'瓾'，讀'鼃黽'之'黽'也。”

瓾字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【瓦字部】　瓾； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页749第37
【字彙】母耿切，音猛。甑帶也。　又【淮南子·說山訓】敝箄甑瓾在?茵之上，雖貪者不搏。【註】瓾讀鼃黽之黽。

瓾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
瓾字的起名意思

暂无。

瓾
Basic explanation of words
瓾
wā
The wrong word of "Tong".
瓾
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [měng]
[Mother Gengqie of "Zihui"]
Retort belt. "Huainanzi · Shuoshan Training": "The evil spirits are above the Yin Yin, although the greedy people will not fight." Gao Yin's note: "The warriors, the warriors; fight, take.'Zeng', read'鼃黾' It's also a'strike'."
瓾
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Wu Ji 1] [Wa Word Department] 　瓾; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 749 37
[Vocabulary] Mother Gengqie, sound is fierce. Zerg belt also.　[Huainanzi·Shuoshan Xun] The 箄甑甑瓾 is above the Yin, although greedy people do not fight. [Note] Zan reads Zun Zhi Zun.
